comments.body: Why not pass a default threshold into the constructor, so you don't require an UpdateThreshold call for proper setup?

I have thought about this.  The problem is that we frequently fail to construct the summary API when the node is initializing.  If I added the summary as an argument to the constructor, the constructor would likely fail when the node first starts up.  In that case, I would want to add retries, which I would rather not do...
